description: Many kms of trails interspersed in the Conn Creek valleys. The trails are in a boreal forest environment which is a habitat for a variety of wildlife including, bears, fox, and marten. The terrain provides numerous changes in elevation which can provide for challenging run, ski or mountain bike ride. It would be an accomplishment to do all these trails in one day.Trails include Deer, Bear, Arctic Winter Games, Beaver, Fox, Moose,  and many more.
directions: One of many trails in Fort McMurray. The trails are in an urban park and can be accessed from numerous points in Thickwood and Timberlea subdivisions. They are easily reachable using local public buses.
title: Birchwood Trails
